snippet: Kenneth R. Lench, who oversaw the Securities and Exchange Commission’s case against Goldman Sachs and Fabrice P. Tourre, announced his departure from the agency just as Mr. Tourre’s trial was beginning.
abstract: Kenneth R. Lench, who oversaw the Securities and Exchange Commission’s case against Goldman Sachs and Fabrice P. Tourre, announced his departure from the agency just as Mr. Tourre’s trial was beginning.

headline.main: An Architect of the Tourre Case to Depart S.E.C.
